metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Combines mystery and drama with a sci-fi twist, similar to 'Stranger Things' and 'Fallout', but with a more psychological focus. The high-concept premise and slow-burn storytelling will appeal to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: A dark and satirical superhero show that shares the irreverent humor and action of 'Rick and Morty' and 'One-Punch Man', while also exploring deeper themes like 'Love, Death & Robots' with its mature content and genre-bending storytelling.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A German sci-fi mystery that is a mind-bending thriller, full of twists and turns like 'Stranger Things', 'The Night Manager', and 'All Her Fault'. Its complex plot and dark atmosphere should appeal to viewers who enjoy suspenseful dramas.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: A feel-good comedy in a similar vein to 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso', offering optimistic humor and lovable characters. While tonally different from your darker shows, it provides a great balance and showcases similar ensemble dynamics.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: This show blends sci-fi, comedy, and mystery in a unique and quirky way. It has the same offbeat humor as 'Rick and Morty' and 'Futurama' but with a British sensibility. The overarching mystery and bizarre plot will keep fans of 'Stranger Things' engaged.
